tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE PopulationTracking (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  year INT,
  population_size INT,
  genetic_diversity FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE population_dynamics (
  population_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  location VARCHAR(255),
  population_size INT,
  sampling_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE genetic_diversity (
  sample_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  genetic_marker VARCHAR(255),
  allele_frequency FLOAT,
  genetic_variation VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE time_tracking (
  tracking_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  sample_id INT,
  population_id INT,
  tracking_date TIMESTAMP,
  measurement VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE GeneticPool (
    pool_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    population_id UUID REFERENCES Population(population_id),
    allele VARCHAR(10),
    frequency FLOAT,
    generation INT
);

CREATE TABLE Migration (
    migration_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    from_location VARCHAR(255),
    to_location VARCHAR(255),
    migration_rate FLOAT,
    year INT
);

CREATE TABLE GeneticEvent (
    event_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    event_type VARCHAR(50),
    population_id UUID REFERENCES Population(population_id),
    event_description TEXT,
    event_date DATE
);
CREATE TABLE GeneticDiversity (diversity_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, population_id UUID, genetic_trait VARCHAR(255), trait_variation FLOAT)
